Header.title: Pet Name Generator
Header.description: Upload a photo of your pet and we’ll suggest names tailored to their look and personality. Fast, friendly, and made just for your companion.

EmptyState.title: Upload a photo to get started!
EmptyState.description: The perfect name could be just one upload away.

ResultsDisplay.title: Great name ideas for your pet

aiAnalysis.title: Smart image analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Our AI examines the photo to pick up on features and personality clues that inspire name ideas.

personalizedNames.title: Personalized suggestions
personalizedNames.description: Get name ideas that suit your pet’s appearance and character — playful, elegant, or unique.

instantResults.title: Quick results
instantResults.description: Receive multiple creative name options in seconds, ready for your new friend.

Metadata.title: Pet Name Generator — AI-powered pet naming
Metadata.description: Upload a photo of your pet and get personalized name suggestions powered by AI. Perfect for dogs, cats and other beloved companions.
Metadata.keywords: pet names, dog names, cat names, AI pet naming, pet name generator, animal names, pet photo analysis

openGraph.title: Pet Name Generator — AI-powered pet naming
openGraph.description: Upload a photo and get tailored name suggestions for your pet.

twitter.title: Pet Name Generator — AI pet naming
twitter.description: Upload a photo of your pet and receive AI-powered name suggestions.
